nayakathwa mandalaya ganath nayakaya ganath eksath jathika pakshikayan thula kisidu wishwasayak nathi bawin idiri palath sabha mathiwaranayedi eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya athiwishishta jayagrahanayak ath kara ganne yayi sulu apanayana boga sanwardhana niyojya amathi nishantha muthuhettigama mahatha pereda (26) galla bataduwedi pawasiya.idiri palath sabha mathiwaranayata eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayen tharaga karana krishantha pushpakumara (raththaran) mahatha ta sahayogaya laba ganimata bataduwe pawathi raswimak amathamin muthuhettigama mahatha me bawa kiweya.muthuhettigama mahatha meseda kiya.
